metadata.description: TWFE MODIS NTLHARM analysis for replication of Hodler & Raschky (2014)

sql_queries.aggregation_query:
SELECT ROUND(reg_fav, 5) AS reg_fav, ROUND(avg_reg_fav_fe0, 5) AS avg_reg_fav_fe0, ROUND(avg_reg_fav_fe1, 5) AS avg_reg_fav_fe1, subdivision, COUNT(*) as count, SUM(ntl_harm) as sum_ntl_harm
        FROM design_matrix
        GROUP BY ROUND(reg_fav, 5), ROUND(avg_reg_fav_fe0, 5), ROUND(avg_reg_fav_fe1, 5), subdivision
sql_queries.design_matrix_query:
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE design_matrix AS
        
            SELECT *
            FROM (
            SELECT *
            FROM (
        SELECT pixel_id AS pixel_id, year AS year, ntl_harm AS ntl_harm, CAST(reg_fav AS smallint) AS reg_fav, subdivision AS subdivision
        FROM read_parquet('/scicore/home/meiera/schulz0022/projects/growth-and-temperature/data_nobackup/assembled/_5km.parquet/**/*.parquet')
        WHERE COLUMNS(['pixel_id', 'year', 'reg_fav', 'ntl_harm', 'subdivision']) IS NOT NULL AND (country IN (2,3,6,9,15,16,18,19,20,22,23,24,27,29,32,33,36,38,39,40,43,45,46,47,48,50,53,59,60,63,65,66,68,70,72,73,74,76,79,80,81,83,85,87,88,90,93,96,98,100,102,107,108,111,114,115,116,117,119,122,124,125,126,130,132,134,136,139,141,143,144,146,148,150,151,155,156,158,160,162,163,165,166,167,169,170,172,174,175,177,178,180,181,182,188,189,191,192,198,199,201,203,207,208,209,215,216,217,218,221,224,227,228,229,230,232,233,237,240,250,256,258,259,260,261,263)) AND (subdivision % 1 == 0)
        )
            JOIN fe_0_avgs fe0
            USING (pixel_id)
            )
            JOIN fe_1_avgs fe1
            USING (year)
